name: design-golden-gate-oligos
title: Design Golden Gate Oligos
description: Design oligonucleotides for Golden Gate assembly with matching overhangs
content:
Overview

This application designs oligos for Golden Gate assembly by identifying backbone overhangs and creating matching insert oligos.

Features

  • Identifies restriction sites
  • Calculates overhangs
  • Designs matching oligos
  • Supports all Type IIS enzymes

Parameters

  • Backbone Sequence: Destination vector
  • Insert Sequence: DNA to insert
  • Enzyme: Type IIS enzyme to use
  • Topology: Circular or linear backbone

Output

Returns forward and reverse oligos with detailed overhang information.
command: git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps_clone 2>/dev/null || (cd prod_apps_clone && git pull) && pip install -q biopython biomni && python prod_apps_clone/biomni/molecular_biology/design_golden_gate_oligos.py "${backboneSequence}" "${insertSequence}" "${enzyme}" ${linear} -o "${outputDir}"

spec.name: enzyme
spec.label: Type IIS Enzyme
spec.description: Enzyme to use (BsaI, BsmBI, BbsI, Esp3I, BtgZI, or SapI)

spec.name: linear
spec.label: Linear Backbone
spec.description: Enter '--linear' if backbone is linear (leave empty for circular)

spec.name: outputDir
spec.label: Output Directory
spec.description: Select or create a stash folder where results will be saved
